diff_hunk:
@@ -7,6 +7,8 @@
 from functools import wraps
 from itertools import product
 from copy import deepcopy
+import __main__
body: This gives you the `__main__` module, i.e., the top level Python module which we initially entered; documented at https://docs.python.org/3/library/__main__.html. We use this in the "No expect file exists" to give a command line invocation which works out of the box.
